data.title: Jill Halfpenny Height
data.meta_description: Find out how tall Jill Halfpenny is, discover other Celebrity Heights and Vote on how tall you think any Celebrity is!
data.text:
Sandy Cowell said on 23/May/23

It turned out that Jill was playing an undercover cop, but the couple fall in love anyway. Philâs pride is so badly hurt that he tells Jillâs Kate to leave. They both cryâ¦..

5ft2.5.

Sandy Cowell said on 21/Apr/23

Jill has joined the cast of EastEnders and sheâs dating Phil, enjoying dinner with him and his Mum. They looked very cosy together. ðð±ðð±ðð±

Phil should consider himself fortunate to have found a girl

equivalent in height to himself, but then I have never seem him dating a tall girl.

5ft2.75.

Miss Sandy Cowell said on 22/Mar/22

Jillâs Rebeccaâs flirtation with the married man didnât stay innocent at all!

Now sheâs gone to Dubai and left him permanently, so Martin comes home and tells wife Gail all about it. Understandably, sheâs about as hurt as a woman can be, but wants to try again.

I wouldnât.

5ft3.

Miss Sandy Cowell said on 4/Jan/22

Jill started as Rebecca in Coronation Street at the tail end of 1999. She's working as a nurse and pouring out her marriage problems to Gail's husband, who is also a nurse.

Certainly so far, it looks pretty innocent to me!

Five foot three from what I can see.

Leesheff85 said on 21/Jan/21

Rob how tall would her ex husband craig Conway be? He starred in films doomsday as sol and the descent as a crawler,devils playground plus tv shows the fades and prey. He is listed 5ft 8 but seeing pictures of him with jill I'd guess 5ft 6 1/2 to 5ft 7 maybe

Editor Rob

with Jill I'd be hard-pressed to envisage him over 5ft 7.

Miss Sandy Cowell said on 25/Nov/19

Jill's smile really makes her stand out on the Coronation Street page!

5ft2.5. ðð

Nik said on 17/Jul/19

I suppose that 5'5.5" is a tall height if 5'2.5" is short!

It's great to know that Jill's Birthday is on the same day as mine!
